TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StripLine extends System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElement implements class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IChartMapArea

summary.span: 表示圖表的帶狀線。

span.span: Represents the strip lines on a chart.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 取得或設定帶狀線的背景色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the strip line.
A structure.
The default color is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::GradientStyle BackGradientStyle { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::GradientStyle get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::GradientStyle value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定帶狀線的漸層樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the gradient style of the strip line.
A enumeration.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定是否圖表項目會顯示漸層，以及方向的漸層中，如果使用。The property determines whether a chart element will display a gradient, as well as the orientation of the gradient, if used. 若要使用漸層色彩：To use gradient colors: - 使用屬性來設定主要色彩。Use the property to set the primary color. - 使用屬性來設定次要色彩。Use the property to set the secondary color. - 設定此所需的漸層樣式的圖表元素的屬性。Set this property of the chart element to the desired gradient style. 不適用這個屬性如果屬性設定為 0.0 的值。This property is not applicable if the property is set to a value of 0.0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartHatchStyle BackHatchStyle { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartHatchStyle get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartHatchStyle value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.HatchStyleEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定帶狀線的影線樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the hatching style of the strip line.
A enumeration.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 規劃圖樣包含透明的背景色彩和背景上繪製的直線。The hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background. 所設定的影線類型中使用的兩個色彩和屬性。The two colors used in the hatch style are set by the and properties. 不適用這個屬性如果屬性設定為 0.0 的值。This property is not applicable if the property is set to a value of 0.0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BackImage { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ImageValueEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定帶狀線的背景影像。

span.span: Gets or sets the background image of the strip line.

value.span: 值，表示影像檔案的 URL。

span.span: A value that represents an image file URL.
The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性定義許多的圖表元素的背景影像路徑，而是絕對或相對 URL。The property defines a path to a background image for many chart elements, and is an absolute or relative URL. 若要將此映像，請使用和屬性。To position this image, use the and properties. 您也可以指定一種色彩顯示為 「 透明 」 映像時藉由設定屬性。You can also specify that one color will be displayed by the image as "transparent" by setting the property. 映像可以是任何支援的.NET Framework 中，包括圖示的有效圖形檔。An image can be any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons. 不適用這個屬性如果屬性設定為 0.0 的值。This property is not applicable if the property is set to a value of 0.0. 背景影像的優先順序高於其他背景屬性，例如漸層色彩。Background images take precedence over other background properties, such as gradient colors.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartImageAlignmentStyle BackImageAlignment { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartImageAlignmentStyle get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartImageAlignmentStyle value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定背景影像的對齊方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the background image alignment.
A enumeration value.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性決定帶狀線; 的背景影像的對齊方式只套用在下列情況才屬性設定為。This property determines the alignment of the background image for strip lines; it is only applied when the property is set to . 如需可用的對齊方式的詳細資訊，請參閱列舉主題。For more information about available alignments, see the enumeration topic.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color BackImageTransparentColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定會以透明繪製之帶狀線背景影像的色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the color of a strip line background image that will be implemented as transparent.

value.span: 將以透明方式顯示的 值。

span.span: A value that will be displayed as transparent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不適用這個屬性如果屬性設定為 0.0 的值。This property is not applicable if the property is set to a value of 0.0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartImageWrapMode BackImageWrapMode { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartImageWrapMode get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartImageWrapMode value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定帶狀線背景影像的繪製模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the drawing mode of the background image of the strip line.
A integer enumeration.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會決定如何顯示的影像。也就是說，並排顯示，縮放等等。This property determines how the image is displayed; that is, tiled, scaled, and so forth. 如果縮放的影像，將會自動縮放以符合週框的帶狀線。If an image is scaled, it will be stretched to fit within the bounding strip line. 如果影像會並排顯示，它會重複繪製，從左上角開始。If the image is tiled, it is repeatedly drawn, starting from the top-left corner. 關於可用文繞圖模式的詳細資訊，請參閱列舉主題。For more information concerning the available wrapping modes, see the enumeration topic. 如果屬性設定為，其中繪製影像的位置取決於屬性設定。If the property is set to , the location where the image is drawn will be determined by the property setting. 不適用這個屬性如果設定為 0.0 的值。This property is not applicable if is set to a value of 0.0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color BackSecondaryColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定帶狀線背景的次要色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the secondary color of the strip line background.

value.span: 值，用於具有影線或漸層填滿的次要背景色彩。

span.span: A value used for the secondary color of a background with hatching or gradient fill.
The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會決定次要背景色彩，許多圖表物件，並套用漸層色彩時，才能使用。This property determines the secondary background color of many chart objects, and is used when gradient colors are being applied. 您可以為任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍色） 值來設定背景次要色彩。You can set background secondary color to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果使用影線，屬性會決定影線線條的色彩。If hatching is used, the property determines the color of the hatching lines. 若要使用的圖表元素背景的漸層色彩：To use gradient colors for the background of a chart element: - 使用屬性來設定主要色彩。Use the property to set the primary color. - 使用此屬性來設定次要色彩。Use this property to set the secondary color. - 設定屬性所需的漸層樣式。Set the property to the desired gradient style. 不適用這個屬性如果屬性設定為 0.0 的值。This property is not applicable if the property is set to a value of 0.0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color BorderColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定帶狀線的框線色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the border color of a strip line.
A value.
The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以為任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍色） 值設定這個屬性。You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果屬性物件設定為 0.0，會繪製一條線，而且它是此屬性而非屬性設定會決定線條的色彩。If the property of a object is set to 0.0, a line will be drawn, and it is this property and not the property setting that will determine the color of the line.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartDashStyle BorderDashStyle { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartDashStyle get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartDashStyle value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定帶狀線的框線樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the border style of the strip line.

value.span: 列舉值，決定帶狀線的框線樣式。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the border style of the strip line.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會指定用於框線的線條樣式。This property specifies the line style used for a border. 行可以是實線、 虛線或一些不同的實心和小數點。The line can be solid, dotted or some variation of solid and dotted.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int BorderWidth { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定帶狀線的框線寬度。

span.span: Gets or sets the border width of the strip line.

value.span: 值，決定帶狀線框線的寬度 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: An value that determines the width of the strip line's border, in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是以像素為單位。This property is measured in pixels.

value.span: 值，表示帶狀線的文字色彩。

span.span: A value that represents the text color of a strip line.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以指定任何有效的 ARGB 色彩，此屬性。You can specify any valid ARGB color for this property. 文字值，指定帶狀線時，這個屬性才適用。This property is only applicable when a text value is specified for the strip line.

span.span: Gets or sets the interval for a strip line, and determines if the strip line is drawn once or repeatedly.

value.span: 值，表示帶狀線之間的間隔。

span.span: A value that represents the interval between strip lines.
The default value is 0.0.

value.span: 表示間隔位移的 值。

span.span: A value that represents the interval offset.

The default value is .

span.span: Gets the name of the strip line.
A value that represents the name of the strip line.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PostBackValue { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定可在 事件上處理的回傳值。

span.span: Gets or sets the postback value that can be processed on a event.

value.span: 字串值，表示傳遞給 事件的回傳值。

span.span: A string value that represents the postback value that is passed to a event.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double StripWidth { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定帶狀線的寬度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of a strip line.

value.span: 值，決定要繪製帶狀線還是線段。

span.span: A value that determines whether a strip or a line is drawn.
The default value is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性不能設定為小於 0.0 的值，否則將會引發例外狀況。This property cannot be set to a value less than 0.0, otherwise an exception will be raised. 如果設定為 0.0，會導致畫;這一行會使用，和屬性設定其色彩、 寬度和樣式。A setting of 0.0 will result in a line being drawn; this line will use the , and property settings for its color, width and style. 沒有任何`Back*`此類別中的屬性並加以使用時的值為 0.0。None of the `Back*` properties in this class are utilized when the value of is 0.0. 如果您設定大於 0.0 的值屬性，將會建立區域。If you set the property to a value greater than 0.0, a strip will be created. ，和屬性只能套用至該區域; 框線的所有`Back*`然後會使用屬性之背景屬性的區域。The , and properties only apply to the border of the strip; all of the `Back*` properties are then used for the background properties of the strip. 如果值屬性為大於 0.0，單位由相關的軸刻度。If the value of the property is greater than 0.0, the units are determined by the relevant axis scale.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType StripWidthType { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 屬性的測量單位。

span.span: Gets or sets the unit of measurement for the property.

value.span: 表示寬度類型的 列舉值。

span.span: A enumeration value that indicates the width type.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會決定所使用的單位屬性。This property determines the units used for the property. 比方說，若要設定的帶狀線，代表 「 一週 」，您可以設定此屬性為並設定屬性設為其中 (1.0)。For example, to set a strip line to represent "one week", you could set this property to and set the property to one (1.0). 您可以變更從這個屬性的值至值時使用相關的軸刻度值。You can change the value of this property from to a value when the relevant axis scale uses a value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定帶狀線的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text for the strip line.
A value that represents the text of a strip line.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::StringAlignment TextAlignment { System::Drawing::StringAlignment get(); void set(System::Drawing::StringAlignment value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定帶狀線文字的對齊方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the text alignment of the strip line.

value.span: 值，表示帶狀線文字的對齊方式。

span.span: A value that represents the alignment of the strip line text.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::StringAlignment TextLineAlignment { System::Drawing::StringAlignment get(); void set(System::Drawing::StringAlignment value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定帶狀線文字的文字行對齊方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the text line alignment of strip line text.

value.span: 值，表示文字行的對齊方式。

span.span: A value that represents the alignment of the text line.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::TextOrientation TextOrientation { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::TextOrientation get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::TextOrientation value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定文字方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the text orientation.

value.span: 值，表示文字方向的對齊方式。

span.span: A value that represents the alignment of the text orientation.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ToolTip { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定帶狀線的工具提示。

span.span: Gets or sets the tooltip of a strip line.

value.span: 值，表示帶狀線的工具提示。

span.span: A value that represents the tooltip of the strip line.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您設定這個屬性，將會自動建立用戶端影像地圖，並對應區域將會建立具有 Title 屬性設定為指定的工具提示字串。If you set this property, a client-side image map will automatically be created, and a map area will be created with the Title attribute set to the specified tooltip string. 對應區域將會使用對應至帶狀線的維度。The map area will use the dimensions that correspond to the strip line. 設定這個屬性會有任何作用，如果屬性設定為`false`。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 預設值為 true。The default value is true.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Url { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.UrlValueEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定帶狀線的目的 URL 或錨點。

span.span: Gets or sets the destination URL or anchor point of the strip line.

value.span: 值，表示帶狀線的目的 URL 或錨點。

span.span: A value that represents the destination URL or anchor point of the strip line.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用絕對 URL，字串運算式的開頭請使用 "http://" 或 "www."。To use an absolute URL, start the string expression with either "http://" or "www.". 如果字串的開頭不是上述其中一個前置詞，則會將字串視為相對 URL。If the string does not start with either of these prefixes, it will be treated as a relative URL.
